title: Design Innovation....
content:
Hi guys, conducting some research for an innovative design project, I would really appreciate if you could all quickly fill out these two surveys. Please answer all questions. Any response is greatly appreciated. Thanks!

[http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=WOjx1d\_2f7HJwwyxzHEg6cMQ\_3d\_3d](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023145544/http:/www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=WOjx1d_2f7HJwwyxzHEg6cMQ_3d_3d "http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=WOjx1d\_2f7HJwwyxzHEg6cMQ\_3d\_3d")  
 [http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=ijOzJQoZ\_2bNA\_2fZgNrHT427w\_3d\_3d](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023145544/http:/www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=ijOzJQoZ_2bNA_2fZgNrHT427w_3d_3d "http://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=ijOzJQoZ\_2bNA\_2fZgNrHT427w\_3d\_3d")

I will post up the outcome of this project in a few weeks....
author: B3N

comments.content: Reconfigure the survey to allow answering a subset of questions and I will participate.
